Preparation instructions:
The Entrepreneur Questionnaire Survey is a quarterly survey established by the People's Bank of China in 1992. The survey targets a nationwide
More than 5,000 industrial enterprises in China (excluding Tibet). The survey content mainly includes the overall production status of the enterprises and the status of production factors.
situation, market demand situation, funding situation, cost-effectiveness situation, investment situation and others. Entrepreneur Questionnaire
c
The index in the survey report is calculated using the diffusion index method, that is, calculating the proportion i of each option and assigning different values to each option respectively.
q
The same weight i (the weight given to the "good/growth" option is 1, and the weight given to the "general/unchanged" option is

sections.title_en: 0.5, given

c q
“差/下降”选项权重为0），将各项的占比 i乘以相应的权重 i，再相加得出最终的指数。
所有指数取值范围在0～100%之间。指数在50%以上，反映该项指标处于向好或扩张状态；
低于50%，反映该项指标处于变差或收缩状态。
主要指数计算方法简单介绍如下：

The value range of all indices is between 0 and 100%. If the index is above 50%, it reflects that the indicator is in a good or expanding state;
Below 50%, it reflects that the indicator is deteriorating or shrinking.
